message.description: Message providing additional details about the response.

stakedHashReward.description: Amount of HASH rewards staked in the given round.

round.description: The round number associated with the reward claim.

gradeList.description: List of grades showing reward rates and percentages.

rewardRate.description: The reward rate for the grade.

percentage.description: The percentage of the total reward for the grade.

stakedCoreReward.description: The CORE rewards staked in the given round.

stakeRatio.description: The ratio of the user's stake to the total stake.

percent.description: The percentage of the user's stake in relation to the total stake.

totalRewardClaimed.description: The total rewards claimed in the given round.

stakedBTCReward.description: The BTC rewards staked in the given round.

400.description: Invalid input parameters or core address.
